definitions.definition: The act or result of making something light or lighter.
( medicine ) The sensation caused by the descent of the uterus into the pelvic cavity before the onset of labour
( nautical ) The removal of cargo (especially crude oil) from a vessel in order to reduce its draft

main_definition: The act or result of making something light or lighter.
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) The sensation caused by the descent of the uterus into the pelvic cavity before the onset of labour
( nautical ) The removal of cargo (especially crude oil) from a vessel in order to reduce its draft

main_definition: ( obsolete or proscribed ) Alternative form of lightning .
